sentences.en: Andrew used to play hockey at school.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁过去上学时常打曲棍球.

sentences.en: Bob brought up the idea of an office hockey pool at the meeting. ( bring up )
sentences.cn: 巴布 在会议中提出可以在办公室内下曲棍球赌注的意见.

sentences.en: Christopher, what an excellent game ! You're a terrific hockey player.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗, 这场冰球打得真精彩,你的球艺真棒.

sentences.en: Football and hockey players wear shoulder pads.
sentences.cn: 足球和曲棍球球员都戴垫肩.

sentences.en: Great Britain's hockey players were outmanoeuvred by Germany.
sentences.cn: 英国曲棍球队不敌德国队。

sentences.en: He injured his knee playing hockey.
sentences.cn: 他打曲棍球时膝盖受伤。

sentences.en: Hi, everybody . Hop in. Welcome to the world of kids hockey.
sentences.cn: 你们好. 上车吧. 欢迎来到儿童冰球世界.

sentences.en: Hockey, volleyball, football and tennis are all sports.
sentences.cn: 曲棍球 、 排球 、 足球、网球都是体育项目.

sentences.en: I really enjoyed watching the game and learning about kids'hockey.
sentences.cn: 观看球赛、了解儿童冰球赛真使我高兴.

sentences.en: In recent times the most striking exports have been in the vocabulary of lacrosse and hockey.
sentences.cn: 在近代最突出的外来词是有关长曲棍球和曲棍球运动方面的词汇.

sentences.en: John played goal for the hockey team.
sentences.cn: 约翰在那个曲棍队当守门员.
她在英格兰队打曲棍球.

sentences.en: She's mad keen on hockey / on Arthur Higgins.
sentences.cn: 她极喜爱曲棍球[阿瑟.希金斯].

sentences.en: Sure. But I need you to bring your hockey stick.
sentences.cn: 行, 不过,你得自己拿球杆.

sentences.en: Valerie earned letters in three sports: volleyball, basketball, and field hockey.
sentences.cn: 瓦莱丽在排球、篮球和曲棍球三个项目上获得了佩戴校名首字母标志的荣誉。

trans.tran_en: a game played on grass by two teams of 11 players, with sticks and a ball
